meta.title: Get Order - Order - Storefront Orders - Orders - API Reference

blocks.data: Returns *Order* data. This will return order data immediately after an order is placed on the storefront.

data.title: Data
data.description: Response data container for Order endpoints (`POST /order` and `POST /order/{orderId}`).

cartId.description: The Id of cart that was converted to order.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: This will always be the same between cart and checkout.

decimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places for the currency. For example, USD currency has two decimal places.

baseAmount.description: Cost of cart's contents, before applying discounts.

orderAmount.description: Sum of line-items amounts, minus cart-level discounts and coupons. This amount includes taxes (where applicable).

orderAmountAsInteger.description: Order amount represented in integer. Eg. 1234 for $12.34

coupons.description: Array of `AppliedCoupon` objects applied to this cart.

displayName.description: The coupon title based on different types provided in control panel section

couponType.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

discounts.description: Array of `AppliedDiscount` objects applied to this cart.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

parentId.description: Bundled items will have their parent's item Id.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image of this item, accessible on the internet.

discounts.description: List of discounts applied to this item, as an array of AppliedDiscount objects.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

discountAmount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item (excluding coupon).

couponAmount.description: The total value of all coupons applied to this item.

listPrice.description: Item's list price, as quoted by the manufacturer/distributor.

salePrice.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

extendedListPrice.description: Item's list price multiplied by the quantity.

extendedSalePrice.description: Item's sale price multiplied by the quantity.

type.description: the product type - physical or digital

addedByPromotion.description: Whether this item has been added automatically by a promotion.

isShippingRequired.description: Whether this item requires shipping to a physical address.

parentId.description: Bundled items will have their parent's item Id.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image of this item, accessible on the internet.

discounts.description: List of discounts applied to this item, as an array of AppliedDiscount objects.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

discountAmount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item (excluding coupon).

couponAmount.description: The total value of all coupons applied to this item.

listPrice.description: Item's list price, as quoted by the manufacturer/distributor.

salePrice.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

extendedListPrice.description: Item's list price multiplied by the quantity.

extendedSalePrice.description: Item's sale price multiplied by the quantity.

type.description: the product type - physical or digital

downloadFileUrls.description: URLs to download all product files.

downloadPageUrl.description: The URL for the combined downloads page.

downloadSize.description: Combined download size, in human-readable style. E.g.: `30MB`.

type.description: Explicitly specifying the gift certificate type

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

customerCreated.description: For guest checkouts, this flag will identify whether a new customer account was created for this order, or whether the billing email already existed on the store.

hasDigitalItems.description: Specifies whether this order has at least one digital item.

isDownloadable.description: Specifies whether this order is fully paid, so that digital items can be downloaded.

isComplete.description: Specifies whether this order is complete and ready to be taken to the order confirmation page.

customerMessage.description: Shopper's provided message for the order
